attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Save Woolworths plc because 30,000 staff will be made redundant plus 1000s more not trading will see so many other companies go 815 stores  for woolies but what about suppliers reps contract cleaners leased lorries the list is endless i say it could be more like 100,000 joining the ranks of the unemployed .

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/savewoolies/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
